items.0: • One shipped AI feature (RAG chat, agentic workflow, or smart assist) tied to a KPI.
items.1: • Safety rails: access control, limits, fallbacks, and human-in-the-loop when needed.
items.2: • Usage dashboard & simple analytics to see adoption, latency and feedback.
items.3: • Clear docs + a 30-min recorded handover so your team can extend confidently.

items.0: • Not "AI for AI's sake". We refuse features users won't feel.
items.1: • Not a 3-month research project. It's a focused build that ships.
items.2: • Not custom LLM training. We use proven building blocks to go fast.

0.title: Days 1-2 · Scope
0.description: Pick the KPI, user flow and "definition of done". Confirm data access & success threshold.

1.title: Days 3-10 · Build
1.description: Implement, demo mid-sprint, put guardrails in, and wire basic usage tracking.

2.title: Days 11-14 · Prove & Launch
2.description: Polish UX, add fallbacks, run checks, ship to production, and review early metrics.

items.0: • Adoption: % of target users who used the feature this week.
items.1: • Faster flow: median time saved vs. baseline task.
items.2: • Quality: user "was this helpful?" score & flagged errors.
items.3: • Cost control: per-usage cost stays within agreed ceiling.
items.4: • Reliability: p95 response under target; no critical incidents.
items.5: • Business impact: 1 simple metric (e.g., ticket deflection rate).

guarantee.title: Simple guarantee
guarantee.description: If we miss the agreed KPI or deadline due to me, I'll keep working at no extra cost until we hit it. Clear, fair, and aligned.

items.0: • B2B SaaS teams with a clear flow to improve and a single decision-maker.
items.1: • You can provide access to the data we need (or a sample export).
items.2: • You're okay with a tight feedback loop and two short check-ins per week.
